songs.title: Knowledge Born
songs.lyrics:
[Sample - Froggy Fresh YouTube video - "3 messages to the haters"]
Got some messages to deliver to all the haters out there, um, who’s hating on the- all my rapping
First off, don’t hate the player, hate the game
I’m sure you’ve heard that one before
Second off, why don’t you quit drinking so much haterade?
Uh, third off...
Um, if you guys would spend less time hating on my raps, then maybe you could spend more time accomplishing your own goals
You know what I mean?
Like, that’s why- that’s the first reason why you should never be a hater
That’s why I’m never a hater, ‘cause like...
If I was going to waste my time hating on other people’s stuff when I could be doing stuff for myself
So that’s a rule you guys always gotta know
So peace out, three messages for the haters
